name: Tower of Rubble 64
overview: A very challenging, yet addictive game in which you are standing on a limited sized platform. The goal is the avoid bricks falling on you. However, there is also a laser that shoots down that occasionally that also call kill you. You can also die by drowning via falling off the platform as the platform is surrounded by water. It's a C64 conversion of a DOS CGA game made by Flatgub for the 2017 CGA Jam and was published in Komoda & Amiga plus magazine #11.
